legal.privacyIntro: Welcome to Hekayaty! We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. By using the platform, you agree to the collection and use of your data as described in this policy.
legal.p1_2: Content: Stories, novels, images, or any content you upload to the platform.
legal.p1_3: Activity: Log of activities, views, and interactions within the site.
legal.p2_1: To manage your account on the platform.
legal.p2_2: To facilitate the publishing and selling of your work through the platform's internal account.
legal.p2_3: To send important notifications about the account or updates.
legal.p2_4: To analyze anonymous data to improve user experience.
legal.p3_1: All data is encrypted during transport and storage.
legal.p3_2: We do not share your data with any third party unless legally required or necessary to provide the service.
legal.p3_3: We have mechanisms to prevent hacking or any unauthorized use.
legal.p4_1: Accessing your data and deleting it upon request.
legal.p4_2: Withdrawing consent to use your data at any time.
legal.p4_3: Objecting to any illegal use of data.
legal.t1_1: You are responsible for any content you upload to the platform.
legal.t1_2: Your content must not violate the rights of any third party or local and international laws.
legal.t2_1: After your first sale, you will receive a share of the profits directly according to the platform's internal account system (typically 80% for creators).
legal.t2_2: The platform reserves the right to modify profit shares, with prior notice to users before any changes.
legal.t3_1: Every user must comply with local laws regarding copyright and e-commerce.
legal.t3_2: Hekayaty is not responsible for any legal violation committed by the user outside the platform's scope.
legal.t4_1: The platform is available 'as is,' and does not assume any financial losses resulting from the use of the platform by users.
legal.t4_2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate any account that violates laws or terms.
legal.t5_1: All data and assets are protected under intellectual property laws.
legal.t5_2: Any attempt to manipulate the system or fraud will lead to immediate legal action.
legal.t6_1: We reserve the right to modify this policy and terms at any time, with users informed of significant changes.
